name: Green Acre Farm
description: Fresh, locally grown vegetables harvested daily for the best flavor and quality.

name: Sunny Orchard
description: A family orchard offering crisp apples, juicy pears, and seasonal fruit favorites.

name: Happy Honey
description: Pure, raw honey sourced from healthy local hives with rich natural sweetness.

name: Fresh Eggs Co
description: Farm-fresh eggs collected every morning from free-range hens.

name: Baker’s Choice
description: Artisan breads and pastries baked fresh each market day.

name: Herbal Roots
description: Organic herbs and natural plant blends grown sustainably.

name: CheeseCraft
description: Small-batch cheeses made from local dairy with bold, unique flavors.

name: Local Deli
description: Quality meats, sausages, and deli cuts prepared from local livestock.

name: Sweet Treats
description: Homemade desserts including cookies, cakes, and seasonal baked goods.

name: Bloom Fields
description: Beautiful fresh-cut flowers and bouquets grown locally.

name: Fresh Dairy
description: Creamy, farm-fresh milk and dairy products from grass-fed cows.

name: Good Roast
description: Freshly roasted coffee beans and brewed drinks for caffeine lovers.

name: Craft Creations
description: Handmade crafts, gifts, and artisan décor created by local makers.

name: Grain Mill
description: Whole grains, flour, and wheat products milled fresh for home cooking.

name: Pure Juice
description: Freshly squeezed fruit juices made from ripe local produce.
